thread.title: At least one dead in Alabama bus crash

title: At least one dead in Alabama bus crash
text:
At least one dead in Alabama bus crash 2:50pm EDT - 01:05 
A bus carrying dozens of Texas high school students back from a trip to Disney World veered off a highway and into a ravine Tuesday, killing at least one and injuring several others. Diane Hodges reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A bus carrying dozens of Texas high school students back from a trip to Disney World veered off a highway and into a ravine Tuesday, killing at least one and injuring several others. Diane Hodges reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pbfe81
